website_summaries.verdict: This is a great time saving option for normal everyday use: simple with all the required features.
pros: This super sturdy and quiet piece requires no assembly!
It unfolds into shape, saving you lots of time
cons: The sizing is not exact for all bed frames

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Not Box Springs
customer_reviews.text: These are two metal rigid foundations, not box springs. They offer no give/flexibility as conveyed by the term "box springs". If you are used to the typical support provided by true box springs, that offer some flexibility and give, this product is not what you're looking for. We have a 14" thick memory foam mattress on top of these and back pain is severe after trying these out for 30 days. Feedback on the seller has been provided in "seller feedback" section within Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This collapsible box spring *seemed* like the perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I live in an old house with a narrow staircase and couldn't get a regular queen sized box spring up the stairs. This collapsible box spring *seemed* like the perfect solution. However, it started to collapse within a couple months. I weigh 190 lbs and my girlfriend weighs 120. If you're going to sell furniture in America, it should be able to hold twice that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Opp

customer_reviews.title: Stains on cover
customer_reviews.text: Solid frame, not too difficult to install. However, the cover had 3-4 stains and handprints in it. They are quite gross. It makes you question the quality control process.
customer_reviews.author: amysacorns

customer_reviews.title: Easy......but.........
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. According to the stickers that say TOP,I have this correctly but I think one needs turned so the zippers line up. The zipper is about 1/4 way down so I can’t really determine which way these should go or if it even matters. Easy set up. Easy to move. I did this alone,no problem. Delivery was quick and on time. So much easier this way than buying a bulky wooden box spring. Hoping the memory foam mattress I ordered works well with this and that it won’t slide.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome convenient upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is simply an awesome, amazing upgrade to conventional boxspring setup. Packaging was excellent, unboxing was as easy as it could be. Set up was effortless and easy for one person. Initial quality is good. This is very sturdy. What I like best is in the future if I want to move this box spring system will make it easy. I recommend you take any negative reviews as the usual percentage and don’t hesitate to get this product. The engineering is brilliant. I can’t comment about the durability and longevity yet but so far I couldn’t be happier. I gave this a good test to for sturdiness and noise. No noise whatsoever. Buy this with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with all Zinus products
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with all Zinus products. I was so close to terminating my membership until this package arrived and of the only smile on my face. I now own, a Zinus hybrid mattress, Zinus box spring and Zinus heavy duty adjustable bed frame. One of the very few companies that never fail to disappoint. I’d love to invest in a head board however I’m afraid to do so cause people butchered the reviews but I believe one can trust this company for great quality sleep at an affordable price. Wish they made blankets and bed sheet sets 🤪
customer_reviews.author: 90sChic

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I will say I was extremely impressed, very solid very well-built. We could not get our queen box up the stairs these were light and easy comparably. I almost bought a much cheaper brand made out of wood until I read all the reviews. Spend the extra money on these they are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Robert Malerba

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't reach the company
customer_reviews.text: I bought a queen and got two separate pieces. I definitely like the height this will give me and set up is easy...just unfold. The cover has an area in the seam that was missed. I tried to reach the company by phone but was unable to. Guess I can sew that up myself. Would give 5 stars if I didn't have to mend it and could reach the company
customer_reviews.author: Lady_A

customer_reviews.title: I think this product is perfect. I had a low Ikea bed and to ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is perfect. I had a low Ikea bed and to be honest I just simply got tired of it. I didn't want to buy another bed-frame, thus I started looking online and decided to give this a try. The height is exactly what I wanted, so there is no disappointments at all. The packaging a big, but at the same time it is befitting for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Doriam91

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy Pezy!
customer_reviews.text: Who ever invented this was brilliant. I wasn't sure when I ordered this how it would come out. I thought it might be cheap and cheesy, what a surprise it is Fabulous! Delivered right to your door. No hassle with salespeople and bartering. I can't saw enough about this product it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, meets the need
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and convenient. Be careful of the cover once you've gotten the whole thing unfolded and zipped up and you're maneuvering it into place- the cover is a bit delicate and can easily snag or tear. Not a big deal if you get it placed correctly without damage because it's not something you move around every day, but it's why this doesn't get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: It's A Perfect Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new house with a converted attic which made it impossible to get a queen size box spring into the bedroom. So I found this, ordered it, or arrived EARLY, and was even easier to set up than I expected! Once you get it out of the box, just unfold each half, lay it on the bed frame, and you're done! What could be simpler!?! If you have any reason you can't use a regular queen size box spring, I highly recommend this solution!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Techy

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: We have a large Queen bed, and we recently decided to move our bedroom downstairs, where we would have a much larger bedroom area. During the moving process, we ran into a serious problem. The wooden box spring for our bed would NOT fit through the stairs leading downstairs. We tried everything, even professional movers. It wasn't going to fit. So, I went on Amazon and found this baby. It was delivered to our door. NO assembly required. It folds, so we had no trouble getting both pieces downstairs. They slid perfectly into our bed. They are sturdy, and our new mattress fit perfectly on top of the boxspring(s). Crisis averted. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Samson May

customer_reviews.title: Split queen - needs center support
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great product. It was easy to unfold. Problem is that this comes in two parts, two separate sides. It needs a center support for the frame. This is not mentioned anywhere in the description on Amazon or in the directions. I contacted Zinus (as the directions say to contact them before returning). They said it's Amazon's fault and I should return it. (great customer service...) The zipper on mine was off, too. Very disappointed and frustrated that I wasted all this time and energy on this because their description was wrong. Returning and getting a different base.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've been meeting to write this for a while. I bought this a few years ago, I recommend it to all my friends and family. I think collectively we bought 7ish. They all have broken. And they started to very early on. No jumping kids. Normal sized people. The welds break and the little bars start cutting up the back of the mattress. Moreover they start bending only after a couple weeks of use - resulting in dips. Used with a tuft and needle, traditional Serta, and purple - with the same result. Swapped out box spring and instantly everything wrong, has been solved.
customer_reviews.author: Obes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Box Spring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box spring to replace a worn-out wooden one I'd been using for years. It was causing me severe back pain and I found out why: the center wooden beam was just dangling on one end, causing the mattress to cave in whenever I climbed into bed! The Zinus box spring is a MASSIVE improvement because it is ALL METAL! I saw right away that this box spring would restore my sleeping experience, and it has. It fit the bed frame perfectly and the ease of setting it up was super-simple and straightforward. I fall asleep pretty easily now and find a confortable sleeping position in no time. This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Sturdy, quiet, and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the split King box springs to replace some regular box springs that came with my bed. I never liked the original box springs, but kept them for warranty purposes. Anyway, these were a breeze to take up the stairs, and unfolded very easily. They're light weight, and sturdier than my previous box spring (which has wood in it). They don't make any noise, and they fit snugly in my bed frame. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DeAd MiKe

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and affordable
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I weight a total of approximately 475 pounds and we have been using this for 4-5 months and it is holding well. We need to raise our bed height because it wasn't high enough to our liking. But this foundation did the job of fixing that. Comes folded and two pieces so if you live in an apartment like me, getting the item through the front door will not be a problem. It is very easy to set up. Simply unfold, pull, and close the zipper and the foundation is ready for use. Highly recommend this if you need an easy to set up and sturdy foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Aggretsuko

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Took out of the box, unfolded it and used it immediately. This sucker seems to be extremely sturdy as well. We 3 teenage boys in The house and they are rough on furniture. Broke the bed frame and Xbox in one shot. I’m pretty positive this thing will hold up to them
customer_reviews.author: Tami W

customer_reviews.title: It unfolds and is ready to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just as it says it will do, this bi fold box spring unfolds and is ready to instant use. No assembly required. I did have to zip the cover shut. No big deal. I wanted to add a sturdy element to my platform bed and 12" mattress. It does a great job, and if I chose not to use it at some point; well it folds in half for storage. How very convenient and space saving. I am glad I took a chance and purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Total lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a queen mattress a few years back for my other home as a guest bedroom set. When I moved to my current home, the box spring wouldn’t fit up the stairs. I was left wondering what to do. Then I saw this.....AMAZING! An adult male slept on it (with mattress of course) for about 4 nights and said it was fine. It’s holding up after a few months. I also slept on it and it’s perfect. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great for a king size bed
customer_reviews.text: Great for a king size bed! We have a platform bed and it was just too low, so I ordered the 9" size and it was exactly what we needed. It's a great design, especially if you have to move it. I can't understand others who say their mattress feels likes it's falling between the it, they must have it upside down as one side has wider openings. I'm even trying to figure out how I can store my winter/summer clothes in side of it for the season.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer

customer_reviews.title: I carried this up two flights of stairs by myself!
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of an amazing product. It arrives flat and folded in half. I wrestled it up two flights of stairs by myself and then persuaded it to unfold and take its proper shape as a box spring on my daughter's bed. I am quite pleased! Not only is this product pretty inexpensive, but also it can be quite difficult to persuade mattress stores to sell box springs without purchasing a mattress as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia San Diego

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I have an antique full bed frame, and a relatively new mattress, but was still using the 100 year old (gigantic, heavy, noisy) springs original to the bed. No box. Just springs. Not conducive to a comfortable night’s rest, and the springs were ruining the mattress. Ordered this product Sunday night, received it Wednesday afternoon, unfolded it with very little effort, and it fit into the bed frame perfectly. My mattress feels SO much more supportive and comfortable now. And no loud creaking sound when I turn over. Haven’t slept on it yet, but I’m excited to go to bed tonight! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Nancee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best box spring!
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is the best! The ease of opening up and set up was awesome! Took less than 5 minutes. Very light weight, easy to maneuver around. Love that it is two pieces for the queen size. Listed as heavy duty and would hold over 500 lbs. Made very well with steel, not aluminum like the others. The corners are welded, rounded and very supportive. The cover is nice and removable it you need to clean it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: happy with how easy it was to setup
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the queen version is just two twin beds put side to side. unfortunately the person who engineered this design didn’t think to add some type of connector so they never can separate under the mattress. I may duck tape the two together if they ever decide to move apart i time. other wise very firm and supportive as of day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy, cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Love this. So easy so durable NO assembly at all. Cover comes off so you can wash it, unlike the one I just replaced which was disgusting. Slats are closer together providing more support for my Temperpedic mattress, all metal, so no allowance for wood to break down or be scratched or chewed by my animals. Most probably last box spring Ill ever have to buy. Yayyyyy!. So worth money
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great for frequent movers, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is awesome. Yes it is pricey, but it’s very sturdy (wife and I are average weight or less, we’re not giant fat people like most Americans) and setup is fantastic. Takedown and transport will be a breeze, given that it is (for the queen) a split box spring meaning two pieces. I expect this will last us through many mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Rambling idiot

customer_reviews.title: GREAT..
customer_reviews.text: FAST DELIVERY,DESPITE THE CURRENT PANDEMIC, EASY ASSEMBLY, GREAT QUALITY, MY ONLY ISSUE WAS I THOUGHT IT WAS ONE WHOLE PIECE, BUT IT CAME AS TWO FOLDABLE PIECES, BESIDES THAT THIS BOX SPRING IS WONDERFUL, I HAD TO GET THIS BECAUSE MY PREVIOUS BOX SPRING WOULD NOT GO UP MY STAIRS WITHOUT DESTROYING MY WALLS, SO I HAD TO GET A FOLDABLE ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Tona

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed ever
customer_reviews.text: Old house with a small bedroom - 10x10 ft. This is our second Zinus full size set (box spring & mattress). Nothing wrong with the first, but we decided to put the two together to have a bed room: one for my wife & I & one for the dogs and / or visiting grandbabies. I have a history of back problems and wake up fine every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Box Springs!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous purchasing this product and scared to open it up. It fits so tightly together that there is some hesitation thinking it is going to "spring open." Nothing could be further from the truth. My teenage son and I set it up. It opens slowly and inflates over 20 minutes or so. It basically assembles itself! I would not hesitate to purchase this box spring again. The fact that it comes folded is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: lil Nugget

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BED SPRING! I've had it for 2 years now and its the best purchase i've made for my room. I've moved 3 times and its the quickest thing to put up and install, easy to get around corners. Absolutely no hassle and isn't very heavy. Would highly recommend if you move a lot or want a bed frame you can put away
customer_reviews.author: CrossedBronte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone who moves frequently!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a bit damaged upon arrival. Looks like it had been dragged at one corner. Some of the plastic stoppers were damaged or missing because of it. Other than that these are great! I ordered the King Split and somehow didn't realize it would be 2 separate box springs they were easy to open and work great. I'm excited they will be easy to move with as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra K.

customer_reviews.title: this is not a full queen foundation as pictured. its two seperate pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a whole piece for a queen but it is actually 2 that you just butt up against each other. Thats kind of deceptive that it said no where on the ad on amazon that this was 2 different foundations. So far it is doing the job but I need to keep butting them up together against each other. I stuck a board inbetween the matress foundation and the bed frame to keep it in place more. Idk if you can bungee them together or what from the bottom. So far its doing the job tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and good height
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Easy assembly and good height. My only issue is with the top material. It could be a bit more textured, as the twin mattresses of decent eight slide around fairly easily on it. Carpet adhesive fixed the issue. I can't comment on durability, as the two I bought are in a guest room and are only used semi-frequently.
customer_reviews.author: CassG

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY!
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was dragging in the door, box is heavy.(2 for QUEEN size) But, it so worth it!! What Assembly? BoxSpring was already put together, even had the case on. SUPER EASY to open w 1 hand lol, (like a pull out couch bed) then you zip case closed & thats it! I am buying these ones from now on! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: nymike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a basement bedroom, for which we couldn't fit a normal queen boxspring down the stairs. The box was easy to fit down narrow stairs and the boxsprings (came in two pieces) were super easy to assemble and fit onto the bed frame. Provides the same height as a normal boxspring and looks great. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: garbage!
customer_reviews.text: ours completely broke in half. would not recommend. amazon gave me a full refund but what a pain it was to un box this whole thing to throw it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Simple instructions, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews for products but I was so pleased by the assembly of this product that i just had to write a review. I live by myself so the ability to set up the box spring by myself was key and the packaging and everything made it so simple! You really do just unbox it, unfold the frame, and everything sets up perfectly. I love the way it sits in my bed frame and it's a perfect height. Awesome overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: It holds me up even though I'm pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big gal and I was a little worried that whatever I bought wasn't going to be heavy enough. But I've had it for over a month and I can now sleep soundly without worrying I'm going to fall through to the floor. Pretty easy to set up. Instructions are really just a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Faylita Hicks

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was not the product shown. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was not the product shown. I had to fully assemble two separate mini box springs. I would have returned the product but time was of the essence and couldn't wait to have this item picked up (nor could I have moved it myself to the post) and wait for re-delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Needed a reasonable box spring for my cabin.
customer_reviews.text: I already had a mattress and wanted an easily transportable nix spring for my cabin. This did the truck and has held up well over the years. I was a bit concerned it might collapse during usage, so I waited a long time before reviewing. I can report it has never collapsed and I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DAmico

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT AND NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT BASED ON REVIEWS AND WAS SO IMPRESSED. VERY STURDY, UNFOLD, ZIP UP COVER AND DONE. GREAT BUY FOR A QUEEN BOX SPRING, AND WILL FIT THRU STAIRWAY AND DOORS BASED ON BEING A SPLIT DESIGN. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Weymouth MA

customer_reviews.title: Good box springs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these box springs! It was simple to assemble. It provides great support for my memory foam mattress. I would definitely recommend it to someone looking for a simple box spring. P.S. It does come in two pieces, so you should have a good frame with slats.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for really tight stairwells or hard place to get a queen box spring.
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't get a regular queen box spring up our internal staircase. This is in two parts and folded up. Unfolded and assembled it is better than a regular queen box spring. We have found it to be very comfortable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Norman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. Don't buy it. The mattress sinks down thru it leaving huge canyons.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Beth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 6 months and I only weigh 115lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this product. I give it an A+ for shipping and ease of setup. At first it was perfect. However, after using it for an entire year, it is noisy and creaks every time I turn in bed. I have a king size bed and I bought the high profile box spring to use for my new Leesa mattress. In the end, I have to give 1 star for poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the king size and I thought it was going to be one whole piece that folded in half, but it's actually two twin box springs that fold in half. Not really a problem, but one of them was extremely bent to one side so much so that I wasn't able to fit both box springs on the frame without setting them up like a triangle and then applying a ton of pressure on the middle to force them down. I'm a bit worried about this potentially causing damage to the box spring or the frame in the future, if not already.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Slack

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about ordering this item but *no tools needed* was a huge draw. It ended up being perfect. I was able to get it set up by myself. Just take it out of the box, unfold the frame, zip the cover. Done. It's sturdy, it's quick, it's easy, and I have a foam mattress on top and it supports it fully. My one caution is that the box is large. Like, half the size of your bed large. If you don't have it delivered directly to your door (Aka. Those living in apartments) be aware that it will not fit in a car, you'll need a hatchback or SUV to transport it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Savoy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I moved due to a narrow staircase and unable to get my queen box spring upstairs. This far exceeded my expectations. Easy to set up and can’t tell the difference what so ever between this and a one piece box spring
customer_reviews.author: Leenz89

customer_reviews.title: Best box spring ever.
customer_reviews.text: The split queen jayanna is one of the best items I’ve ever purchased. It is so sturdy and easy to put together. I do 98% of my shopping online...the surpasses the vast majority of everything I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I needed a full-size box spring for my son, we had just moved and the full-size box spring that we had wouldn't fit up our stairway. This was the perfect solution. It is heavier than I expected it to be made of metal, and once I had it up I was afraid that I wouldn't be able to collapse it, but it was easily collapsible too, so I know I'll be able to get it out when the time comes for us to move again, or when my son moves out he can take it with him.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Cox

customer_reviews.title: This is really easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to find this box spring for my daughters twin beds. I had been trying to figure out what to get them that would be easier for me to set up and this was one of the best purchases I have made for their beds. I bought 2 of them and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Smart Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding box spring and easy to set up. We purchased a queen size and returned it for a full size. Both orders arrived on time. It is solid. We also bought a Zinus Green Tea memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of engineering!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item by cartgage truck and the gentleman was nice enough to carry it into the house for me. Next, it came in a large skinny box and I thought the box spring would be thin, but to my surprise, my friend opened the box, unfolded the box spring and voila, it was a full sized queen box spring. It is very well constructed, a breeze to assemble. It is light weight, and will fold up when it needs to be moved. This is a great piece of engineering. Love it! Darlene
customer_reviews.author: Darlene R

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: The box spring is a little higher than I wanted, but it arrived quiclly and was easy to set up. I wish I would have know about this sooner because I would have bought it years ago. I have always dreaded buy a box spring from the store and either paying for delivery or hauling it ontop of my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C

customer_reviews.title: not supportive for memory foam mattresses
customer_reviews.text: *EDIT* this boxspring actually sucks a lot. There are about 3 support beams going horizontally causing giant gaps in support and my mattress straight up sinks into the boxspring when I sit or lay down. Causing major back problems. I can’t even unfold this product so I’m not sure how to even discard of it.... Way better than expected! Super heavy and sturdy but came in a large but thin box. When you fold the boxspring open it widens up by itself- all you have to do is fold and zipper the cover up and done!! Best bed purchase I’ve ever made 🙂 very soft cover & convenient for future moving!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up, Fast Shipping, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to supplement a mattress I purchased from Costco. The mattress was great (and expensive) but it did need something under it for more support. This did the trick! It came in a very thin box so I was nervous how it was going to unravel to be honest. The shipment arrived as promised and the driver even called me when he was there and since I was not home he left it inside the front entrance to my building! Great service! The box spring itself was extremely easy to set up, I did everything myself in less than 15 minutes. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fix
customer_reviews.text: This was the absolute best value and perfect solution for my bedding needs as the original boxspring would not fit up the staircase. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Years now is breaking
customer_reviews.text: It started popping sounds when you sit on it and get up. They are getting deeper and louder as time goes on. Will have to replace soon.
customer_reviews.author: juicy360

customer_reviews.title: Made me a believer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move to the room and unpack. Setup was easy to the point of being unreal. The most important part is that it is sturdy. No more squeaks.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Own a great box spring
customer_reviews.text: Box spring is great to sleep on..it came in a box, folded in half and compacted. When unfolded it assumed, in a locked position, its designed 9” height along with the queen LxW dimensions, and was easy to position on the bed frame under the mattress. The spring unit is very sturdy and provides a solid foundation for the mattress. I recommend it to whoever needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard E. Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I had the loudest, squeakiest box spring in the world before this one, and this is nearly silent in comparison. There are some very minor squeaks, but nothing bothersome or that can be heard in another room.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly simple
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is such a good idea! We Have a narrow stairway which would not allow us to get a king box spring upstairs. Having the split king fold like it did made things so simple. This product made it so I could carry them upstairs by myself. They seem very supportive and were super easy to unfold and zip up. Next box spring I need I will definitely be getting another of these. I’ll also be recommending then to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the extra cost since you do not have to assemble it with tools or a million pieces. It comes in an easy to carry box. When you open it it is in two pieces so easy to carry through tight spaces. Assembly took less than 3 minutes. You should save yourself the trouble and get it!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. No assembly required and I was able to maneuver it around a very tight corner in our old house without difficulty. I haven’t noticed a decrease in comfort or n Any other user issues.
customer_reviews.author: teri l taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, I was thinking that there was no way it contained a 9 inch thick box spring, it wasn't even 4.5" thick! But after unboxing, unfolding, and sliding the boxspring in place. Wow! A sturdy 9" boxspring! The fabric zippers together to finish the "assembly". The fabric is tougher than the standard stuff underneath most box springs; our kitty so far has not been able to claw his way into the boxspring.
customer_reviews.author: DukeDuker

customer_reviews.title: Price is high & the king is cheaper but its great!
customer_reviews.text: This item comes as two pieces so dont fall not the listing photos. Came clean easy to set up and works great for my queens bed frame. My leesa mattress sits perfect on top and is still breathable. I recommend if you plan to move from apartment to apartment every few years. The folding allows for easy moving and they are not super heavy to move alone.
customer_reviews.author: Cece Chante

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kudos to you. What a super smart feat of engineering. The hardest thing was getting it up to the bedroom. The only downside is, it’s actually two pieces, so you will need bed slats and several center post legs for support. But, that said this should be the last box spring you’ll buy.
customer_reviews.author: leslie schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use including two guest one of whom is a large person, seems to be a good purchase. Arrived in good condition and was put in place without a problem. It is being used with a regular innerspring mattress. Consider it a good purchase especially as an apt dweller.
customer_reviews.author: julia seal

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: Folding box springs ... best invention EVER! Just set mine up for my king size mattress ... sooo easy to do and perfect because it would have been impossible to get a regular box spring into my room (awkward stair position) .... So yeah, I'm extremely satisfied with these double box springs! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Clawz

customer_reviews.title: Great if you never want to close it or want bed basically on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this came with legs and wheels. It does not. When opened great. Do not try to fold again as cover is very taught and hard to get back in position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great. I love that I didn’t have to put 100 pieces together for a box spring. I highly recommend it this thing was great. I love that I didn’t have to put 100 pieces together for a boxspring. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Delivery too !!!  I’m a very Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bed frame and super easy & super fast to install, love it !!! 5 STARS ALL THE WAY !!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Culbreath

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single woman who lives alone. I was easily able to carry these upstairs by myself and get it put together. Easy to open up and put on your frame. Really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: It came folded and was actually surprisingly easy to get into the house
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's very small bedroom. It came folded and was actually surprisingly easy to get into the house, to the room and opened up and set up. Took about 30 minutes because her house is tiny and the room is an extra that also held a large chest freezer that we had to work around. But it works!
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is great. I just opened like a folder table and the cover was already in. Lightweight but strong. Perfect product to me.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The box spring arrived in a timely manner. It does look deceiving at first before opening the box because I thought how can that box contain a cal-King box spring, My husband and I unfolded each piece and placed them on the bed frame. It is sturdy and AMAZING, I highly recommend it! It took us less than 10 minutes to get it out of the box and onto the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a queen size bed
customer_reviews.text: Our box spring was made of plastic and virtually falling apart. This one opened up to reveal a metal frame with softer material covering this. Perfect fit for a queen size bed. Our Sleep Number bed fit nicely on top.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Flesher

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to navigate up my rather narrow hallway
customer_reviews.text: I was truly shocked! It got here quickly, and it wasn't hard to get up to second floor with stairs, it was easy to navigate up my rather narrow hallway, and all I had to do was slide it outta the box and unfold it,boom that simple. It's strong and sturdy. Im ordering another one next week! And it's metal so it'll last forever! And it folds in half so it'll be easy if I need to move it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: pat vancour

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: But everything I needed! What makes this product great is that it set up in seconds (30 for each one)!
customer_reviews.author: Big Bev

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: I’m in luv..!!! I purchase another one soon after, fantastic my coworkers want to purchase one..!!!!👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Soengsugpd

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Spectacular Product, A++
customer_reviews.text: Holy Moses!!! Wow, this may be one of the best purchases I have ever made in my life. Just wow. Amazing product, so simple to setup, literally took 5 seconds. Can I buy into this company....?
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Edward

customer_reviews.title: I could not believe how easy and nice this was to receive and setup
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very sturdy and best of all I could move myself, and setup my self and NO ASSEMBLY. Love it, Best invention.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick James

customer_reviews.title: Great Box Spring!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box spring!! It was convenient for travel as it was needed for our son's mattress at school. He stated that it is great, even though the mattress we originally purchased was not supposed to need a box spring, we felt it needed more support. This one is perfect and being that it was shipped folded it was very easy to transfer. Very affordable box spring and we highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Leyna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I have a small stairway to the second floor and this was perfect. Easy to use and place in the frame of our bed. Fantastic! I would recommend this for anyone who needs a better and easier way to get a king size bed up those small stairways.
customer_reviews.author: Deb M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a second floor apartment with a narrow stairway, and couldn't fit my box spring up the stairs. I looked at some reviews for this product, and it sounded like it would fit my needs. It certainly did. It is comfortable and compact, and I'm glad such a thing exists, or I would still be sleeping on a mattress on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reusch

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and super pleased
customer_reviews.text: I saw the great reviews, so I took a chance. On the way here, the package got lost for a few days, and during that time I started doubting my purchase. Folding box springs? Are they hokey? When the box finally got here with my two twin size boxes (for a king mattress) I got even more worried because the packing box was so small. But, my husband and I got them out, unfolded them, zipped up the covers, and voilà! Best box springs ever! Super sturdy metal frames, strong fabric covers, AND they fold up for transport. Who came up with these? Because they are genius!
customer_reviews.author: TRichins

customer_reviews.title: Easy in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So easy. No assembly. Lightweight. Right out of the box. At 60, I did it all by myself. Queen size.
customer_reviews.author: Hilery Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely easy to setup. I didn’t expect it to come as a set of two (seems like two twin sized box spring). It is very sturdy, but they do separate so I wish there was something to attach the to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmeen Wellere

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed and so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic idea. Our 40 yr old house has a narrow staircase, and gouges in the wall from the last time we tried to get a queen box spring up the stairs. When the box arrived, I measured the thickness and was concerned they sent the wrong size as there is a thinner model. But when unfolding the sides expand to the full advertised width. Great support, let's hope they can hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Pigskins

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Have a Cal King with no way to get normal box spring up the stairs. Was worried about quality, but this product is very well made. A very pleasant surprise. I also bought a queen size for guest bedroom. Even if you have room to get king size box spring up the stairs, this folding box spring will make the next move very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it will fit your frame.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit my frame although product is shown with the same type I have.
customer_reviews.author: Angelcat47

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: This set works great. IT perfectly supports our foam mattress, without any noise or movement. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert From NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Eliminated tugging a full size box spring up two flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Derald S.

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: The Queen came in two pieces. Extremely easy to assemble and sturdy! I wasn’t expecting it to be so lightweight and still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyana

customer_reviews.title: Split box spring
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a thinner split box spring. This one is MUCH better. Definitely worth the money! Easy to assemble and light enough to carry up stairs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vala

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: So easy even for a "senior " to drag in and set it up. I would recommend it for anyone esp for people who move a lot! May get another one in queen for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to buy two.
customer_reviews.text: This solved the problem of getting a queen boxspring into an attic bedroom. Super amazing product. Easy set up. And the bed is well supported. Make sure to buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

product_meta.title: Zinus Jayanna 9 Inch BiFold Box Spring / Mattress Foundation / Zero Assembly / Sturdy Metal Structure / High Profile, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Design:Box SpringBelieve it or not, we’ve made the box spring more functional, more durable, and dare we even say, fun! Our Jayanna BiFold Box Spring is not your average foundation. It features a structure made of thick and durable steel, meaning that frames and mattresses may come and go, but this box spring will be with you for the long haul. What’s more, its folding design not only makes set-up insanely easy, but it also comes in handy on moving day, maneuvering easily in and around tight hallways and corners. Once unboxed, this brilliant foundation practically assembles itself by taking shape once unfolded. Essentially, deciding where to place the bed will take longer than setting up this box spring. Backed by both our 5-year worry free warranty and hundreds of positive customer reviews, the Jayanna box spring is about as easy as decisions get.
feature_bullets: Sturdy Steel Frame With Poly Jacquard Cover

AS SIMPLE AS UNFOLD & UNWIND - Requiring no tools and zero tedious assembly, the innovative BiFold box spring requires only unfolding to become bedtime ready; the hardest part will be taking it out of the box

DURABLY ENGINEERED - Durable steel is used to construct the interior framework of this reliable foundation; slats are spaced 2.8 inches apart; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
HIGH PROFILE DESIGN - An 8 inch height is perfect for shorter mattresses or for those who enjoy their bed higher off the floor
THOUGHTFULLY PACKAGED - All parts and instructions are packed into one compact box that ships straight to your door
Worry-free 5 year limited warranty included; box spring only, a bed frame or platform bed is required to support this foundation and is sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars953 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Sturdy Steel Frame With Poly Jacquard Cover
